body.p:
Lexington Ky
October 28th 1864
His Excellency
Governor Thos. E. Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Governor
I have the honor to make the following recommendations for promotion in the Eleventh Kentucky Cavalry --
Second Lieut Rufus Somerby to be Captain Co "M" vice Wm Mangan promoted
Sergt Jno Bradburn to be 2nd Lieut Co "M" vice Somerby --
First Sergt B. F. Lewis to be 2nd Lieut Co "K" vice Harris resigned.

I am Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
W. O. Boyle
Lt Col 11' Ky Cav
